meanings.definition: Combine (a number of things) into a coherent whole.
meanings.sent1: She synthesized all the ingredients to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent2: The scientist synthesized different chemicals to create a new compound.
meanings.sent3: The chef synthesized various flavors to surprise her guests.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork synthesized colors and shapes in a mesmerizing way.
meanings.sent5: The music band synthesized various instruments to produce a unique sound.

meanings.sent1: The lab technician synthesized a new medicine for the patients.

meanings.sent4: Her words synthesized a sense of calm in the chaotic room.
meanings.sent5: The artist synthesized paint colors to achieve the perfect shade for her masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Combine (constituent elements) into a single or unified entity.

meanings.sent3: The comedian synthesized jokes and magic tricks for a hilarious performance.
